summary: "Redguard Knight Armor" is a lore friendly, stand alone, heavy or light armor set. This set was built to cater to the Redguard players out there. There was only one Redguard themed armor set in all of Skyrim... until now.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/W2Fsy.png[/img]

[center]An armor mod by Hothtrooper44.[/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/nZG6x.png[/img]
The Redguards hail from another land, and are aliens in Skyrim. Their homeland of Hammerfell is dry, dusty, and hot. Since many players wish to role play as races from afar, I have decided to aid in this endeavor. Redguards can now don a set of armor from back home as they traverse the unforgiving tundra of Skyrim. If you enjoy role playing, and know the lore of the Redguards, this set is for you.

[center][youtube]TVMZw5eyvUE[/youtube][/center]
Note that the classic weapon of the Redguards, the Scimitar, has been included as a craftable and upgradable item in this mod. Why play a Redguard without one?

The cape for the set is found in the Misc section of the forge and is optional to wear.

The armor is scaled to be near Dragon Bone in armor value and weight. The Scimitar is equivalent to a Daedric sword. The items are powerful, but within the bounds intended for the game. I don't want the player to outgrow the item's stats, but still kept the stats within reason for your game-play.

Craftable under the Steel section at a normal forge. The components are simple and easy to attain, but there is a certain satisfaction that comes with forging your own equipment rather than picking it up from a freebie box.

This set is hand crafted for both genders and all races.

Feedback on the armor should be left in the comments section. I will read all the comments made and consider requests for alterations and potential fixes.

[center]** If you like it, endorse it! **[/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/b86kR.png[/img]
I would like to take this small space to thank the users of my mods, and the Nexus community at large. I am honored to be a part of this community, and to contribute to it. Thank you for your patronage of my work, whether it comes through comments, endorsements, or even a kind donation. You are the reason that I spend long hours of work bettering Skyrim. The Nexus community is the reason I continue to create mods. Thank you.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/X866s.png[/img]
If you wish to use this armor set for your mod, please ask me by message first.
I do wish to help other mods and the community at large with my work, so don't hold back from asking!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/btN0j.png[/img]
hothtrooper44 - Redguard Knight Armor
Bethesda - Skyrim and it's assets
Moveing - chain-mail shirt textures
1000stenar - some of the screenshots
aoki, lumps, mannygt, Omesean - inspiration/help!
